about.title: About Me
about.description: Passionate web developer with solid experience in creating modern web applications. I specialize in JavaScript technologies, particularly React, Node.js, and Next.js.
about.text: Passionate Full Stack Developer, I am currently pursuing a Bachelor's degree in Angular at Studi and I am looking for an internship or a traineeship of 2 to 6 months, ideally in Angular/node js projects.
